pullRequest.title: [risk=no][RW-4361] remove requireInstitutionalVerification feature flag from UI and config
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description:
API updates were in #3739
Tested locally by creating a new user, creating a workspace, and editing a profile


PR checklist

 This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
 This PR includes appropriate unit tests
 I have run and tested this change locally
 I have run the E2E tests on ths change against my local UI + API server with yarn test-local
 If this includes a UI change, I have taken screen recordings or screenshots of the new behavior and notified the PO and UX designer
 If this includes an API change, I have updated the appropriate Swagger definitions and notified API consumers
 If this includes a new feature flag, I have created and linked new JIRA tickets to (a) turn on the feature flag and (b) remove it later

nodes.bodyText: email is no longer handled in this file.  See account-creation-institution and its spec
Academic vs Non-Academic Affiliation is not a concept which exists in new-style affiliation
This is not related to institutional affiliation and was added after the comment
these also refer to old-style affiliation
rm (verification = false) test.  diff continues with the rest of the true test
flag was false before.  now it's true and there's an extra page
not clear why this was here.  DUCC should not be affected by this.
probably should have flag-protected the section above this.  So it's been always-true for a while already.  oops.
IIRC this represents some older behavior.  It's not currently correct.
email is now on the institution page
